data.title: You  need to try the rice noodles!
data.text: The rice noodle soups are a must try, that is if you like spicy food! We ordered a takeout of two of the rice noodle soups and they were out of the place good, authentic. Lots of noodles and ingredients. Soup base was full of flavors that blown us away. It was so spicy that we couldn't finish all. The leftover was saved for the next meal, just heated up and added a bit more noodles and vegetables into it.  $20 for two meals for two adults, you can't get better than that! We plan to go back there again and again!

data.title: Great Chinese Takeout
data.text: Stopped in and ordered a general gau's and pork lo mein (about $16) on my way home. Small place that's basically take out only.Greeted by a nice woman in a chef's coat who answered all my questions about the menu. It was semi typical with an "enthusiastic" section for more authentic choices. Food was hot and ready in 5 minutes. I obviously wasn't feeling adventurous tonight but the "staples" I ordered were excellent. Huge portions, not greasy at all, and the dinner combos come with crab rangoon and a choice of rice. Excellent value. I'm a huge hole in the wall takeout place fan and this one is definitely on my list.

data.title: Very good takeout Chine Food
data.text: We were pleasantly surprised how good this Takeout Only Chinese restaurant is. Always good and prompt deliveries.

data.title: Poor Service
data.text: Delivery took over 1 hour and 50 minutes, food was cold.  Soup was provided with no spoon; spicy chicken was bland.  Was not worth the wait, and was not worth the money spent.  The restaurant should have provided a notice they were busy and deliveries would take longer than an hour.

data.title: New Regular Customer!
data.text: I'm sold... I will officially be a repeat customer of this place. The food is fantastic. Service exceptional! Prices extremely reasonable!! I got the crab rangoons, beef teriyaki, and egg drop soup! I am so impressed there aren't enough words to describe! Delicious, flavorful, Chinese food you will NOT be disappointed!!
